title: LeaverBuster Issue Riot Staff Help
body: I was in my 20 minute queue, and when the queue timer finished it took me back to the main page. Please fix, I do not want to wait another fucking 20 minutes of my life

replies.body:
Hey xSilentRose,

The Low Priority Queue system requires you to go through the 20 minute wait before you're entered into the matchmaking system. Could it be possible that you missed a queue pop and it sent you back to the main screen?

No i was there watching the whole time, as it finished the low priority queue it would put me into the normal queue yes? but instead it went to main screen no queue. oh well its fine my mate finished my priority queue's gota love people with no lives.
